org.csstudio.platform.security
Class ActivationService

java.lang.Object
  org.csstudio.platform.security.ActivationService
All Implemented Interfaces:
IRightsManagementListener, IUserManagementListener
public final class ActivationService
extends java.lang.Object
implements IUserManagementListener, IRightsManagementListener

This class (de-)activates the registered objects if the current user has the permission for the id of the object.

Author:
Kai Meyer & Torsten Witte & Alexander Will & Sven Wende

getInstance

public static ActivationService getInstance()

registerObject

public void registerObject(java.lang.String id,
                           java.lang.String defaultRight,
                           java.lang.Object object)
                    throws NoActivationAdapterFoundException
Registers the given object with the given ID. It is necessary that an IActivationAdapter is registered by the AdapterManager of the Platform or the object is an IAdaptable and delivers an IActivationAdapter. If no IActivationAdapter is found the registration is denied.

Parameters:
id - The ID for the object
defaultRight - An IRight as default value if the ID is unknown; can be null
object - The object to manage
Throws:
NoActivationAdapterFoundException - If no standard IActivationAdapter is available for the object

getActivationAdapter

private IActivationAdapter getActivationAdapter(java.lang.Object object)
Returns a IActivationAdapter for the object or null.

Parameters:
object - The object, which IActivationAdapter should be returned
Returns:
IActivationAdapter The IActivationAdapter for the object or null

registerObject

public void registerObject(java.lang.String id,
                           java.lang.Object object)
Registers the given object. Calls registerOject(String, String, Object)

Parameters:
id - The id for the object
object - The object to manage

registerWidget

public void registerWidget(java.lang.String id,
                           java.lang.String defaultRight,
                           java.lang.Object object,
                           IActivationAdapter adapter)
Registers the given object with the given ID and the given IActivationAdapter.

Parameters:
id - The ID for the object
defaultRight - An IRight as default value if the ID is unknown; can be null
object - The object to manage
adapter - The IActivationAdapter for the given object; must not be null

unregisterObject

public boolean unregisterObject(java.lang.String id,
                                java.lang.Object object)
Unregisters the given object.

Parameters:
id - The ID, which was used to register the widget
object - The object, which should be unregistered
Returns:
True if the object could be unregistered; false otherwise

unregisterObject

public boolean unregisterObject(java.lang.Object object)
Unregisters the given object.

Parameters:
object - The object, which should be unregistered
Returns:
True if the object could be unregistered; false otherwise

dispose

public void dispose()
Disposes the current ActivationService. All registered objects are removed and unregisters this ActivationService as UserManagementListener and RightsManagementListener

doRefreshState

private void doRefreshState()
Checks all registered objects if they should be activated or deactivated.
